title: Boy Meets World actress Maitland Ward swaps Disney for PORN film
text:
Boy Meets World actress Maitland Ward has ditched her Disney past in favour of a career in pornography.

The star, 42, who played Rachel McGuire in the hit Nineties sitcom, spoke candidly to In Touch about her career change, as she confessed she opted to explore the adult film industry after being 'impressed' by the writing.

Speaking to In Touch Weekly, she explained: 'They asked me to be a part of this, and I thought, "I never knew there was anything in adults or porn or whatever that was this well done". I read the script, and I was like, "This is really, really well written"'.

Changing it up: Boy Meets World actress Maitland Ward has ditched her Disney past, (left), in favour of a career in pornography

In 1998, Maitland joined Boy Meets World as main cast member starred as Rachel McGuire in its sixth season until it ended in 2000.

Now however, her career has had a huge change after she began her work in porn and has signed to adult boutique talent agency Society 15.

She went on: 'This has so many themes in this and just my character is so different than anything I have portrayed before'.

'I felt ready. It wasn’t like I was saying, "Oh, I want to do this all along", but it was like, "I need to do this". I really feel that quality stuff and the hot sex stuff can be together, and I really want that.'

Changing it up: In 1998, Maitland joined Boy Meets World as main cast member starred as Rachel McGuire in its sixth season until it ended in 2000

Moving on: Now however, her career has had a huge change after she began her work in porn and has signed to adult boutique talent agency Society 15

Her chat comes ahead of the release of her latest movie Drive, which she was promoting on Instagram with a sizzling snap.

Following a different social media path is her co-star Danielle Fishel, who hit headlines earlier this year when she shared a new photo of her son to Instagram.

The photo gave just a sneak peak at the newborn, named Adler. Showing just his legs resting on the family's beloved rescue dog, Brunch, the new mom gave a glimpse into her world.

Way back when: She went on: 'This has so many themes in this and just my character is so different than anything I have portrayed before' - a still from Boy Meets World

Changing round: Following a different social media path is her co-star Danielle Fishel, who hit headlines earlier this year when she shared a new photo of her son to Instagram

This comes days after the Boy Meets World star finally brought her little boy home from the hospital after three weeks in the NICU after being born early.

The 38-year-old said, 'The house is a mess, I have a stye on my left eye. I haven't showered in two days. I can't remember when I did anything.'

Explaining the sleepless nights with a newborn she said she and her husband Jensen 'now take baby night shifts where we pass each other like zombies mission.'

But she was clear: 'They are some of the best days of my life.'
description: The star, 42, who played Rachel McGuire in the hit Nineties sitcom, spoke candidly to In Touch about her career change, as she confessed she opted to explore the adult film industry
